summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to the recommendations where they can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines our 54 priority open recommendations for HHS as of March 2019. For example, in May 2018, we recommended that the Centers...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Department of Health and Human Services
